} public boolean method2(String srcString) { /** * æ€è·¯åˆ†æ * æ–¹æ³•2â€”â€”åŒæŒ‡é’ˆ * 1)å¼•å…¥ä¸¤ä¸ªindexå˜é‡int left=0 , int right = srcString.length()-1 * 2)+â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”+ * | | | | | | | | * +â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”+ * ^ ^ * | | * left right * 3)è®©leftå‘å³ç§»åŠ¨ï¼Œrightå‘å·¦ç§»åŠ¨ï¼Œä¸€ç›´å¾ªç¯åˆ°left>right,å¦‚æœæœŸé—´é‡åˆ°éæ•°å­—æˆ–å­—æ¯çš„å­—ç¬¦å°±è®©left++,æˆ–right--ï¼Œå³è·³è¿‡å®ƒä»¬ * 4)å¯¹å…¨éƒ¨è½¬æˆæˆå°å†™çš„å­—ç¬¦åšå‡ºç›¸ç­‰åˆ¤æ–­ï¼Œä¸€æ—¦æœ‰ä¸€ç»„å­—ç¬¦ä¸ç­‰ï¼Œå°±è¿”å›falseï¼Œå¦‚æœå¾ªç¯ç»“æŸä¾ç„¶æ²¡æœ‰è¿”å›falseï¼Œä»£è¡¨è¯¥å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ˜¯å›æ–‡ä¸²ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆè¿”å›true */ int left = 0; int right = srcString.length() - 1; while (left <= right){ if(Character.toLowerCase(srcString.charAt(left))!=Character.toLowerCase(srcString.charAt(right))){ return false; } left++; right--; if (!Character.isLetterOrDigit(srcString.charAt(left))){ left++; } if (!Character.isLetterOrDigit(srcString.charAt(right))){ right--; } } return true; } public static void main(String[] args) { System.out.println(new IsPalindrome().method2("l,ev e l")); } }

content: package efl.ryl.easy; import java.util.ArrayList; import java.util.List; /** * Author: Azad-eng * Date: 2022/3/3 * Description: æ¨è¾‰ä¸‰è§’ */ public class Pascal_Triangle { // [1] // [1,1] // [1,2,1] // [1,3,3,1] // [1,4,6,4,1] // [............] public List<List<Integer>> generate(int numRows) { //äºŒç»´åˆ—è¡¨çš„è¿ç”¨â€”â€”æ¨è¾‰ä¸‰è§’ /** * æ€è·¯åˆ†æï¼š * 1.ä¸»é›†åˆList<List<Integer>> retæœ‰ä¸”ä»…æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªï¼Œä½†å­é›†åˆList<Integer> row æœ‰numRowsä¸ª(numRows=ret.size()),å› æ­¤è¦newåˆ›å»ºret.size()ä¸ªrow * -æ‰€ä»¥ for (int i = 0; i < numRows; ++i) {} * 2.rowé›†åˆä¸­å…ƒç´ çš„addè§„å¾‹ï¼šç¬¬1è¡Œï¼Œadd 1æ¬¡ï¼Œç¬¬2è¡Œï¼Œadd 2æ¬¡...ç¬¬numRowsè¡Œï¼Œadd numRowsæ¬¡ * -æ‰€ä»¥ for (int j = 0; j <= i; ++j){} * 3.addçš„å€¼ä¹Ÿæœ‰è§„å¾‹ï¼š * -3.1 æ¯ä¸€è¡Œå¤´å°¾(ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªè¡Œå¤´å°¾é‡åˆ)çš„å€¼éƒ½æ˜¯1ï¼šrow.get(0)=1ï¼Œrow.get(i)=1 * -æ‰€ä»¥if (j == 0 || j == i) {row.add(1);} * -3.2 éå¤´å°¾çš„å€¼ =ä¸Šä¸€è¡Œçš„ç›¸åŒä½ç½®çš„å‰ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ çš„å€¼ +ä¸Šä¸€è¡Œçš„ç›¸åŒä½ç½®çš„å…ƒç´ çš„å€¼ * -æ‰€ä»¥ row.add(ret.get(i-1).get(j-1) + ret.get(i-1).get(j)) */ //Listæ˜¯æ¥å£ï¼Œä¸èƒ½å®ä¾‹åŒ–,å› æ­¤List<List<Integer>> list = new List<>(); x List<List<Integer>> ret = new ArrayList<>(); for (int i = 0; i <= numRows - 1; i++) { List<Integer> row = new ArrayList<>(); for (int j = 0; j <= i; j++) { if (j == 0 || j == i) { row.add(1); } else { row.add(ret.get(i - 1).get(j - 1) + ret.get(i - 1).get(j)); } } ret.add(row); } return ret; } public static void main(String[] args) { System.out.println(new Pascal_Triangle().generate(5)); } }

content: package efl.ryl.easy; import java.util.*; /** * Author: Azad-eng * Date: 2022/3/5 * Description: è¿”å›å’Œä¸ºç›®æ ‡å€¼çš„ä¸¤æ•°çš„ä¸‹æ ‡æ•°ç»„ */ public class TwoSums { public int[] method1(int[] nums, int target) { /** * æš´åŠ›è§£æ³•â€”â€”çº¿æ€§æŸ¥æ‰¾(å®Œæ•´çš„éå†ä¸€æ¬¡æ•°ç»„çš„æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ä¸ºâ€”â€”O[n]) * å½“i=0æ—¶ï¼Œj={1,2...nums.length-1}å³éœ€è¦å°†iä¸jæ¯”è¾ƒn-1æ¬¡ * å½“i=1æ—¶ï¼Œj={2,3...nums.length-1}å³éœ€è¦å°†iä¸jæ¯”è¾ƒn-2æ¬¡ * ...... * å½“i=n-1æ—¶ï¼Œj={nums.length-1}å³éœ€è¦å°†iä¸jæ¯”è¾ƒ1æ¬¡ * ä¸€å…±æ¯”è¾ƒäº†(n-1)+(n-2)+(n-3)+...1æ¬¡ * ç­‰å·®åºåˆ—æ±‚å’Œï¼šn*(n-1)/2 = 1/2 n^2 - 1/2n * å› æ­¤æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦=O(n^2) */ int[] ints = new int[2]; for (int i = 0; i < nums.length; i++) { for (int j = 0; j < nums.length; j++) { if (i != j && (nums[j] == target - nums[i])) { ints[0] = j; ints[1] = i; break; } } } return ints; } public int[] method2(int[] nums, int target) { /** * ä¼˜åŒ–â€”â€”å“ˆå¸ŒæŸ¥æ‰¾ * æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦=O(n) * [ä¼˜åŠ¿åªæœ‰åœ¨æ•°æ®é‡å¤§æ—¶æ‰èƒ½å‡¸æ˜¾] */ if (nums == null || nums.length == 0) { return new int[0]; } HashMap<Integer, Integer> map = new HashMap<>(); Set<Integer> keySet = map.keySet(); for (int i = 0; i < nums.length; i++) { map.put(i, nums[i]); if (map.containsValue(target - nums[i])) { for (Integer key : keySet) { if (map.get(key).equals(target - nums[i]) && key != i) { return new int[]{key, i}; } } } } return new int[0]; } public static void main(String[] args) { System.out.println(Arrays.toString(new TwoSums().method2(new int[]{3, 2, 4}, 6))); } }
